metadata.title: CVE-2016-10205 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Session fixation vulnerability in Zoneminder 1.30 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack web sessions via the ZMSESSID cookie.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10205` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
